alert.note: Alert for Hanson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 2:01PM MDT until April 01 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Hanson County. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 4 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
